Pricing

Premium marketing, startup-friendly prices – results that speak louder than our rates

Beginner

$100/month
  • Up to 5 project members
  • Unlimited tasks and projects
  • 2GB storage
  • Integrations
  • Basic support

Pro

Popular
$499/month
  • Up to 50 project members
  • Unlimited tasks and projects
  • 50GB storage
  • Integrations
  • Priority support
  • Advanced support
  • Export support

Business

$799/month
  • Up to 5 project members
  • Unlimited tasks and projects
  • 200GB storage
  • Integrations
  • Dedicated account manager
  • Custom fields
  • Advanced analytics
  • Export capabilities
  • API access
  • Advanced security features
